pages.name: Concentration
pages.text: The potion of Concentration removes those annoying fumes that a body emanates after drinking a magical concoction. This has two main uses: one is to avoid getting your vision constantly disturbed by those swirling puffs of smoke, the second is to better conceal

yourself when you use a potion of invisibility.$(br2)Pay attention at the order in which you drink your potions, though. This effect only removes the particles for potions that have already started to influence you. Any new effect won't be affected.
